caption: Membership Request
description: Request object for membership operations including subject, group, role, effective time, and reason.
name: membership_request

subject.caption: Subject
subject.description: The agent or organization identifier that is the subject of the membership operation.

group.caption: Group
group.description: The group or organization identifier where membership is being managed.

role.caption: Role
role.description: The role assigned to the member (e.g., member, admin, operator).

effectiveTime.caption: Effective Time
effectiveTime.description: Timestamp when the membership change becomes effective.

reason.caption: Reason
reason.description: Optional reason or justification for the membership change.
